experience.title: Full Stack Developer
info: Created web applications based on React for Windstream CCS,using tools like Redux, Tailwind and Material UI.
Developed applications in React utilizing Hooks, Formik, WebSockets, and implemented live chat functionality using mqtt.js.
Led a team of five React developers to rebuild the platform entirely from the ground up.
